column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////We had breakfast here on Dec 24th. I had the sausage and egg sandwich
column2: my husband had steak and eggs
column3: and the kids had some desserts. The pastries were the only good things. Hubby's steak was pathetic
column4: my sandwich tasted okay but little did I know how awful it actually was. Few hours later I got violently sick and kept getting sick with diarrhea well into Christmas day. Thank you for screwing up my Christmas.
